attributes.action: Introduce a Zero tolerance Policy on ALL Crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years Politicians have said they will be tough on crime and all they do is play at it.
It is time to REALLY get tough.
There should be a Zero tolerance approach to ALL crime with Severe Penalties for those who transgress.

Also minimum sentancing should be brought in and time off for good behaviour scrapped.
